body:
When will this be happening:

The Tournament will be official starting after the league is finished so next year around summer time I will make an official post on everything updated and all the info needed..

Prizes:

The prizes will be decided when the winners are declared

1st Place(         )
2nd Place(        )
3rd Place(        )


Times:

We are still looking for times that would work so if you have a list of times that would work for each timezone feel free to reply on this thread with the list


Map Rotation: (looking for bigger map, if you want to suggest some maps to use reply with them on this thread)

-SpringWood


Regarding Teams:

Applications will be open now so I can get a good feel of how were gonna work it out like single knock out or whatever.

Max Amount of teams are 8, Max amount of players per team is 10-15 probably 10 cause most walls teams don't have over 10 players.

Accepted List:

.WallJumperZ
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
Application Format:
(Anyone from your team can apply but ask your leader first)

Skype:
Team Name:
10 Players Representing Your Team:

*Please Email your application to dawteal@outlook.com with the Subject (Walls Application) I will reply to anyone who emails me a.s.a.p but don't worry if I don't respond to you right away.

Thank You For Reading
-Dawson
